items.title: Employees Say They Coast in Summer. Here’s Why Adam Grant Advises Bosses to Be Chill About It

items.title: Use This New Research on Workplace Confidence to ‘Win’ at Meetings
items.description: It turns out that acting wildly confident while explaining your plans might not be the best way to convince colleagues you’re right.

items.title: How a New Bill to Make Benefits Portable Could Help Entrepreneurs
items.description: People often shy away from freelancing or starting their own business because they want the security of employer-sponsored health care and retirement ...
